name: Employee Management Application
summary: Help business store employee information and help managers manage employees weekly schedule in an easy to use format.
tools: ReactJS, Axios, Express, Node, Firebase, Mongoose, Robo 3T, Nodemon, Concurrently, React Bootstrap, Moment, Material-UI, Syncfusion, Dotenv, NPM, Heroku, VsCode, CSS, and Github

name: Google Book Search
summary: This application searches for books and save a list of books that the user might be interested in buying or reading.
tools: React, Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js, CSS, React-Bootstrap, Material-UI-Bootstrap, Axios, Dotenv, Robo3T, VsCode, Github, Heroku, Google Books API

name: POS System
summary: Using my restaurant experience to create a better Point of Sale System (POS). To use this application you would need a login password that must be create using the manager password. There is also a password to login as a cashier so that you do not see the manager settings. The current manager password is 8 and cashier password is 0.
tools: JQuery, Node, API, Moment, Axios, MySQL, Express, CSS, Bootstrap, VsCode, GitHub, Heroku
